title: FS/FT: T213 type 3 Meyers fielding, New Haven - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T213 type 3 Meyers fielding, New Haven - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Recent pickup I don’t need. Tougher Type 3 T213 with Meyers Fielding, New Haven. Rougher condition but appears to have some transfer on the front.

Asking $SOLD shipped or to trade for T206’s.

Thanks for looking!
